body_html: tf.Variable will add variable to GLOBAL_VARIABLES, and won't add it to MODEL_VARIABLES. It seem that Superivisor only save MODEL_VARIABLES. I fix this by call tf.contrib.framework.add_model_variable for all varibles defined by tf.Variable.
body_text: tf.Variable will add variable to GLOBAL_VARIABLES, and won't add it to MODEL_VARIABLES. It seem that Superivisor only save MODEL_VARIABLES. I fix this by call tf.contrib.framework.add_model_variable for all varibles defined by tf.Variable.
body: tf.Variable will add variable to GLOBAL_VARIABLES, and won't add it to MODEL_VARIABLES. It seem that Superivisor only save MODEL_VARIABLES. I fix this by call tf.contrib.framework.add_model_variable for all varibles defined by tf.Variable.
